modName: Set completo Campione Nordico - Complete set Nordic Champion - Now StandAlone
summary:
------Italiano------
Set completo da campione Nordico


------English------
Complete set of Nordic Champion
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=yellow][size=72]IF YOU LIKE, ENDORSE![/size][/color][/b][/center]

[center]
[IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm314/Redigondor/ROBO_zps0c05b476.png[/IMG][/center]

[center][u][b][color=yellow]NOW STANDALONE[/color][/b][/u][/center]

[u][b][color=Blue]Translate Project[/color][/b][/u]

I want my mod more playable for all people without exception!I want traslate it in the most knowed Language!

- Italiano : [color=green]Ok![/color]  
- English : [color=green]Ok![/color]  
- French : [color=red]I don\'t Speak French..i\'m sorry! But if you speak French&English contact me for Translate the mod![/color]
- German : [color=red]I don\'t Speak German..i\'m sorry! But if you speak German&English contact me for Translate the mod![/color]
- Spanish : [color=red]I don\'t Speak French..i\'m sorry! But if you speak Spanish&English contact me for Translate the mod![/color]
-Japanese : [color=red]I don\'t Speak Japanese..i\'m sorry! But if you speak Japanese&English contact me for Translate the mod![/color]

[center][IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm314/Redigondor/bandiera-italiana_zpsf3144698.gif[/IMG][/center]

[center][u][b][color=red]RICHIEDE IL DLC DRAGONBORN[/color][/b][/u][/center]


Questa Mod aggiunge un nuovo set Nordico da Campione, totalmente craftabile e potenziabile


Il set comprende:
-Armatura completa (maschio e femmina)
-Arco e Faretra e frecce
-Mazza
-Pugnale
-Spada
-Spadone
-Ascia
-Ascia da guerra
-Martello

[center][u][b][color=red]INSTALLAZIONE[/color][/b][/u][/center]

Se avevi precedentemente installato la versione non Stand Alone
Elimina le seguenti cartelle \"Nordic\" situate in 

C:/..../Skyrim/data/Textures/Dlc02/Armor
&
C:/..../Skyrim/data/Textures/Dlc02/Weapons

[center][u][b]- Installazione StandAlone[/b][/u][/center]

Copia il contenuto della cartella in

C:/....../Skyrim/Data


[center][IMG]http://i299.photobucket.com/albums/mm314/Redigondor/bandiera-inglese1_zpsf30c4efa.gif[/IMG][/center]

[center][u][b][color=red]DRAGONBORN DLC REQUIRED[/color][/b][/u][/center]

This mod Add a Complete Nordic set totally craftable and Upgreadable


The set includes:
-Complete Armor (Male and Female)
-Bow, quiver and Arrows
-Mace
-Dagger
-Longsword
-Greatsword
-Axe
-BattleAxe
-Hammer

[center][u][b][color=red]INSTALLATION[/color][/b][/u][/center]

If you previously installed the Not stand-alone version
Delete the following \"Nordic\" Folders located in

C:/..../Skyrim/data/Textures/Dlc02/Armor
&
C:/..../Skyrim/data/Textures/Dlc02/Weapons

[center][u][b]- StandAlone Install[/b][/u][/center]

Copy the contents of the Folder in

C:/....../Skyrim/Data

[center][u][b][color=yellow]Special Thanks[/color][/b][/u][/center]
Slasher7: helped me with the problem for making the StandAlone version! THANKS A LOT MAN

[center][u][b][color=yellow]My Other Mods[/color][/b][/u][/center]
1° - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31864]Frecce Daedrice REALI - REAL Daedric Arrows[/url]
2° - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31929]Scudo Ammazzadraghi - Dragon Slayer Shield[/url]
author: Game Sanchez
